docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN groupadd crate && useradd -u 1000 -g crate -d /crate crate

docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN curl --retry 8 -o /openjdk.tar.gz https://download.java.net/java/GA/jdk13.0.1/cec27d702aa74d5a8630c65ae61e4305/9/GPL/openjdk-13.0.1_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz     && echo "2e01716546395694d3fad54c9b36d1cd46c5894c06f72d156772efbcf4b41335 */openjdk.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -     && tar -C /opt -zxf /openjdk.tar.gz     && rm /openjdk.tar.gz

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: yum install -y yum-utils     && yum makecache     && yum install -y python36 openssl     && yum clean all     && rm -rf /var/cache/yum     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc     && export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"     && gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 90C23FC6585BC0717F8FBFC37FAAE51A06F6EAEB     && gpg --batch --verify crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc     && tar -xf crate-4.1.4.tar.gz -C /crate --strip-components=1     && rm crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && ln -sf /usr/bin/python3.6 /usr/bin/python3     && ln -sf /usr/bin/python3.6 /usr/bin/python
docker.raw: RUN yum install -y yum-utils     && yum makecache     && yum install -y python36 openssl     && yum clean all     && rm -rf /var/cache/yum     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc     && export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"     && gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 90C23FC6585BC0717F8FBFC37FAAE51A06F6EAEB     && gpg --batch --verify crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" crate-4.1.4.tar.gz.asc     && tar -xf crate-4.1.4.tar.gz -C /crate --strip-components=1     && rm crate-4.1.4.tar.gz     && ln -sf /usr/bin/python3.6 /usr/bin/python3     && ln -sf /usr/bin/python3.6 /usr/bin/python

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crash_standalone_0.24.2     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc     && export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"     && gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 90C23FC6585BC0717F8FBFC37FAAE51A06F6EAEB     && gpg --batch --verify crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc crash_standalone_0.24.2     && rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc     && mv crash_standalone_0.24.2 /usr/local/bin/crash     && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/crash
docker.raw: RUN curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crash_standalone_0.24.2     && curl -fSL -O https://cdn.crate.io/downloads/releases/crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc     && export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"     && gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 90C23FC6585BC0717F8FBFC37FAAE51A06F6EAEB     && gpg --batch --verify crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc crash_standalone_0.24.2     && rm -rf "$GNUPGHOME" crash_standalone_0.24.2.asc     && mv crash_standalone_0.24.2 /usr/local/bin/crash     && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/crash

docker.name: LABEL

args.org.opencontainers.image.title: "crate"
args.org.opencontainers.image.description: "CrateDB is a distributed SQL database handles massive amounts of machine data in real-time."

docker.raw: LABEL maintainer="Crate.io <office@crate.io>"     org.opencontainers.image.created="2020-03-20T11:37:45.220429"     org.opencontainers.image.title="crate"     org.opencontainers.image.description="CrateDB is a distributed SQL database handles massive amounts of machine data in real-time."     org.opencontainers.image.url="https://crate.io/products/cratedb/"     org.opencontainers.image.source="https://github.com/crate/docker-crate"     org.opencontainers.image.vendor="Crate.io"     org.opencontainers.image.version="4.1.4"
